title: Populate Retell Dynamic Variables with Google Sheets Data for Call Handling
author: Agent Studio

}"},"typeVersion":1.1},{"id":"10919781-9750-417f-bba6-293bf99dbc3e","name":"Get user in DB by Phone Number","type":"n8n-nodes-base.googleSheets","position":[140,0],"parameters":{"options":{},"filtersUI":{"values":[{"lookupValue":"={{ $json.body.call_inbound.from_number }}","lookupColumn":"Phone Number"}]},"sheetName":{"__rl":true,"mode":"list","value":"gid=0","cachedResultUrl":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TYgk8PK5w2l8Q5NtepdyLvgtuHXBHcODy-2hXOPP6AU/edit#gid=0","cachedResultName":"Users"},"documentId":{"__rl":true,"mode":"list","value":"1TYgk8PK5w2l8Q5NtepdyLvgtuHXBHcODy-2hXOPP6AU","cachedResultUrl":"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TYgk8PK5w2l8Q5NtepdyLvgtuHXBHcODy-2hXOPP6AU/edit?usp=drivesdk","cachedResultName":"Retell sample UserDB"}},"credentials":{"googleSheetsOAuth2Api":{"id":"ufBkeygvc1l17m5N","name":"Baptiste AS - Google Sheets account"}},"typeVersion":4.5},{"id":"de9a2ff5-690e-4e1e-ab5c-5a8825986871","name":"Sticky Note1","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[-880,-440],"parameters":{"color":7,"width":601,"height":1105,"content":"## Handle Retell's Inbound call webhooks

## Overview
- This workflow provides Retell agent builders with a simple way to populate [dynamic variables](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables) using n8n.
- The workflow fetches user information from a Google Sheet based on the phone number and sends it back to Retell.
- It is based on Retell's [Inbound Webhook Call](https://docs.retellai.com/features/inbound-call-webhook).
- Retell is a service that lets you create Voice Agents that handle voice calls simply, based on a prompt or using a conversational flow builder.

## Prerequisites
- Have a [Retell AI Account](https://www.retellai.com/)
- [Create a Retell agent](https://docs.retellai.com/get-started/quick-start)
- [Purchase a phone number](https://docs.retellai.com/deploy/purchase-number) and associate it with your agent
- Create a Google Sheets - for example, [make a copy of this one](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TYgk8PK5w2l8Q5NtepdyLvgtuHXBHcODy-2hXOPP6AU/edit?usp=sharing).
- Your Google Sheet must have at least one column with the phone number. The remaining columns will be used to populate your Retell agent’s dynamic variables.
- All fields are returned as strings to Retell (variables are replaced as text)

## How it works
- The webhook call is received from Retell. We filter the call using their whitelisted IP address.
- It extracts data from the webhook call and uses it to retrieve the user from Google Sheets.
- It formats the data in the response to match Retell's expected format.
- Retell uses this data to replace [dynamic variables](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables#dynamic-variables) in the prompts.


## How to use it
See the description for screenshots!
- Set the webhook name (keep it as POST).
- Copy the Webhook URL (e.g., `https://your-instance.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/retell-dynamic-variables`) and paste it into Retell's interface. Navigate to "Phone Numbers", click on the phone number, and enable "Add an inbound webhook".
- In your prompt (e.g., "welcome message"), use the variable with this syntax: `{{variable_name}}` (see [Retell's documentation](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables)).
- These variables will be dynamically replaced by the data in your Google Sheet.


## Notes
- In Google Sheets, the phone number must start with `'+'`.
- Phone numbers must be formatted like the example: with the `+`, extension, and no spaces.
- You can use any database—just replace Google Sheets with your own, making sure to keep the phone number formatting consistent.

readme:
## Overview

  * This workflow provides Retell agent builders with a simple way to populate [dynamic variables](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables) using n8n.
  * The workflow fetches user information from a Google Sheet based on the phone number and sends it back to Retell.
  * It is based on Retell's [Inbound Webhook Call](https://docs.retellai.com/features/inbound-call-webhook).
  * Retell is a service that lets you create Voice Agents that handle voice calls simply, based on a prompt or using a conversational flow builder.



## Who is it for

For builders of [Retell's](https://www.retellai.com/) Voice Agents who want to make their agents more personalized.

## Prerequisites

  * Have a [Retell AI Account](https://www.retellai.com/)
  * [Create a Retell agent](https://docs.retellai.com/get-started/quick-start)
  * [Purchase a phone number](https://docs.retellai.com/deploy/purchase-number) and associate it with your agent
  * Create a Google Sheets - for example, [make a copy of this one](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TYgk8PK5w2l8Q5NtepdyLvgtuHXBHcODy-2hXOPP6AU/edit?usp=sharing).
  * Your Google Sheet must have at least one column with the phone number. The remaining columns will be used to populate your Retell agent’s dynamic variables.
  * All fields are returned as strings to Retell (variables are replaced as text)



## How it works

  * The webhook call is received from Retell. We filter the call using their whitelisted IP address.
  * It extracts data from the webhook call and uses it to retrieve the user from Google Sheets.
  * It formats the data in the response to match Retell's expected format.
  * Retell uses this data to replace [dynamic variables](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables#dynamic-variables) in the prompts.



## How to use it

See the description for screenshots!

  * Set the webhook name (keep it as POST).

  * Copy the Webhook URL (e.g., `https://your-instance.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/retell-dynamic-variables`) and paste it into Retell's interface. Navigate to "Phone Numbers", click on the phone number, and enable "Add an inbound webhook".  
![Screenshot 20250331 at 16.38.06.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_31_at_16_38_06_21633866fa.png)

  * In your prompt (e.g., "welcome message"), use the variable with this syntax: `{{variable_name}}` (see [Retell's documentation](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables)).  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_f276e0cc55.png)

  * These variables will be dynamically replaced by the data in your Google Sheet.




## Notes

  * In Google Sheets, the phone number must start with `'+`.
  * Phone numbers must be formatted like the example: with the `+`, extension, and no spaces.
  * You can use any database—just replace Google Sheets with your own, making sure to keep the phone number formatting consistent.



#### 👉 [Reach out to us](mailto:hello@agentstudio.io) if you're interested in **analysing your Retell Agent conversations**.
readme_html:
Overview

  • This workflow provides Retell agent builders with a simple way to populate dynamic variables using n8n.
  • The workflow fetches user information from a Google Sheet based on the phone number and sends it back to Retell.
  • It is based on Retell's Inbound Webhook Call.
  • Retell is a service that lets you create Voice Agents that handle voice calls simply, based on a prompt or using a conversational flow builder.

Who is it for

For builders of Retell's Voice Agents who want to make their agents more personalized.

Prerequisites

  • Have a Retell AI Account
  • Create a Retell agent
  • Purchase a phone number and associate it with your agent
  • Create a Google Sheets - for example, make a copy of this one.
  • Your Google Sheet must have at least one column with the phone number. The remaining columns will be used to populate your Retell agent’s dynamic variables.
  • All fields are returned as strings to Retell (variables are replaced as text)

How it works

  • The webhook call is received from Retell. We filter the call using their whitelisted IP address.
  • It extracts data from the webhook call and uses it to retrieve the user from Google Sheets.
  • It formats the data in the response to match Retell's expected format.
  • Retell uses this data to replace dynamic variables in the prompts.

How to use it

See the description for screenshots!

  • Set the webhook name (keep it as POST).

  • Copy the Webhook URL (e.g., https://your-instance.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/retell-dynamic-variables) and paste it into Retell's interface. Navigate to "Phone Numbers", click on the phone number, and enable "Add an inbound webhook".

  • In your prompt (e.g., "welcome message"), use the variable with this syntax: {{variable_name}} (see Retell's documentation).

  • These variables will be dynamically replaced by the data in your Google Sheet.

Notes

  • In Google Sheets, the phone number must start with '+.
  • Phone numbers must be formatted like the example: with the +, extension, and no spaces.
  • You can use any database—just replace Google Sheets with your own, making sure to keep the phone number formatting consistent.

👉 Reach out to us if you're interested in analysing your Retell Agent conversations.
readme_zh:
## 概述

  * 本工作流为Retell智能体构建者提供了一种通过n8n填充[动态变量](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables)的简易方案。
  * 该流程会根据来电号码从Google表格中提取用户信息，并返回给Retell平台。
  * 基于Retell的[呼入网络钩子功能](https://docs.retellai.com/features/inbound-call-webhook)开发。
  * Retell是一项支持通过提示词或对话流程构建器快速创建语音交互代理的服务。

## 适用对象

适用于希望为[Retell](https://www.retellai.com/)语音代理增加个性化功能的开发者。

## 前置条件

  * 拥有[Retell AI账户](https://www.retellai.com/)
  * [创建Retell智能体](https://docs.retellai.com/get-started/quick-start)
  * [购买电话号码](https://docs.retellai.com/deploy/purchase-number)并绑定至智能体
  * 创建Google表格（可[复制此模板](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TYgk8PK5w2l8Q5NtepdyLvgtuHXBHcODy-2hXOPP6AU/edit?usp=sharing)）
  * 表格中需包含电话号码列（其他列将用于填充Retell动态变量）
  * 所有字段均以字符串形式返回至Retell（变量将以文本形式替换）

## 实现原理

  * 接收Retell的网络钩子调用（通过IP白名单过滤）
  * 从调用数据中提取信息并查询Google表格
  * 将数据格式化为Retell要求的响应格式
  * Retell利用这些数据替换提示词中的[动态变量](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables#dynamic-variables)

## 使用指南

（请参照截图说明）

  * 设置网络钩子名称（保持POST方法）
  * 复制网络钩子URL（如`https://your-instance.app.n8n.cloud/webhook/retell-dynamic-variables`）并粘贴至Retell界面：进入"Phone Numbers"→点击电话号码→启用"Add an inbound webhook"  
![网页截图](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_31_at_16_38_06_21633866fa.png)

  * 在提示词（如"欢迎语"）中使用`{{变量名}}`语法引用动态变量（参见[官方文档](https://docs.retellai.com/build/dynamic-variables)）  
![示例图片](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_f276e0cc55.png)

  * 这些变量将自动替换为Google表格中的对应数据

## 注意事项

  * Google表格中的电话号码需以`'+'`开头
  * 需严格遵循示例格式：包含国家代码、无空格（如`+14151234567`）
  * 可替换为其他数据库（需保持电话号码格式一致性）

#### 👉 如需**分析Retell智能体通话记录**，欢迎[邮件咨询](mailto:hello@agentstudio.io)
title_zh: 使用Google表格数据填充Retell动态变量以处理呼叫
